p: This review aims to provide an overview of COVID-19 pandemic from pediatric rheumatologistâ€™s perspective. The aspects of COVID-19 resembling rheumatic diseases, the possible reasons for why children are affected less severely, the hypothetic role of other available vaccines in preventing COVID-19, the unique position of patients with rheumatic diseases in this pandemic, the COVID-19 patients with rheumatic diseases in the literature, and COVID-19 treatment with the drugs used for rheumatic diseases are discussed. Also, a systematic literature search was conducted to identify COVID-19 patients with rheumatic diseases.
